description.value:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

You lament your fate, forcing each living creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] to attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

Success The creature is unaffected and temporarily immune to Frightful Moans for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.
